Package org.acme.model

Class ConvertingPojoToAvroRecord

java.lang.Object
org.acme.model.ConvertingPojoToAvroRecord
public class ConvertingPojoToAvroRecord extends Object
This class provides methods for converting POJOs (Plain Old Java Objects) to Avro records. It offers three different approaches:
  • Straightforward mapping: Manually maps POJO fields to Avro record fields.
  • Reflection-based mapping: Uses reflection to automatically map POJO fields to Avro record fields, including superclass fields.
  • ReflectDatumWriter-based mapping: Leverages the ReflectDatumWriter for a more robust and efficient conversion.
Each method demonstrates a different technique for achieving the same goal, allowing for flexibility based on specific needs and performance considerations.

      public static org.apache.avro.generic.GenericData.Record mapPojoToRecordStraightForward(Barracks pojo)
      Maps a Barracks POJO to an Avro record using a straightforward approach.
      Parameters:
      pojo - The Barracks POJO to convert.
      Returns:
      The Avro record representing the POJO.

    • mapPojoToRecordReflection

      public static org.apache.avro.generic.GenericData.Record mapPojoToRecordReflection(Barracks pojo) throws IllegalAccessException
      Maps a Barracks POJO to an Avro record using reflection. This method handles fields from superclasses.
      Parameters:
      pojo - The Barracks POJO to convert.
      Returns:
      The Avro record representing the POJO.
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException - If accessing a field throws an exception.

    • mapPojoToRecordReflectDatumWriter

      public static org.apache.avro.generic.GenericData.Record mapPojoToRecordReflectDatumWriter(Object pojo) throws IOException
      Maps a Object to an Avro record using ReflectDatumWriter. This method is generally more efficient and robust.
      Parameters:
      pojo - The Object to convert.
      Returns:
      The Avro record representing the Object.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an I/O error occurs during the conversion.
